name: df-iccp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ciccp, cmpt(s0, cn, crab(s1, co(cxr, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))), wral(s2, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), clt, cfv(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1)))))))
comment: Define partitions of a closed interval of extended reals. Such partitions are finite increasing sequences of extended reals. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jul-2020.)
